name: 3Blue1Brown
description: 3Blue1Brown, by Grant Sanderson, is some combination of math and entertainment, depending on your disposition
why: Because of awesome visualization of hard math concepts

name: Kurzgesagt – In a Nutshell
description: Videos explaining things with optimistic nihilism
why: Because of awesome animation and the through research behind it.

name: Great Big Story
description: Since our launch in late 2015, our producers have traveled to more than 100 countries to discover the untold, the overlooked and the flat-out amazing
why: Because of being super informative and entertaining in the same time, and they way i can learn about different cultures in a fun way.

name: Big Think
description: Get actionable lessons from the world’s greatest thinkers & doers. Our experts are either disrupting or leading their respective fields
why: I get to learn from top experts from each field
